rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wide and welcoming entrance with Vastu-compliant positioning ensuring positive energy. West-facing plot consideration ensures sunlight exposure.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious central living area integrating traditional Kerala-style wooden beams and local stone finishes. Open plan to connect with the veranda for natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen; designed following Vastu principles ensuring balance between east and north directions. Incorporates traditional Kerala aesthetics with large windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-planned kitchen area with modern amenities integrated into a traditional setting. Open plan design ensures connectivity with the dining area.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Cozy servant quarters on the ground floor offering privacy and ease of access to service areas.

openings.description: Grand entrance door that complies with Vastu for auspicious entry.
Spacious balcony integrated into the design, ensuring ample sunlight and breeze. Each bedroom on upper floor has a dedicated balcony.
Access from the ground level to the rooftop terrace. Designed as per Vastu guidelines ensuring energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom with Balcony
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom overlooking the west facade; includes a large balcony providing natural light and air circulation. Follows traditional Kerala aesthetics.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2 with Balcony
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom designed with ample space, adjoining balcony ensuring privacy and ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3 with Balcony
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with a dedicated balcony; incorporates Kerala-style design elements for charm and functionality.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4 with Balcony
rooms.description: Smaller yet functional bedroom complete with a private balcony offering fresh air and natural light.

openings.description: Dedicated door for balcony access from each bedroom; ensures privacy and ease of access.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace offering panoramic views of the surroundings with traditional Kerala-style stone and wood finishes. Designed for relaxation and hosting gatherings.

openings.description: Elevated access ensuring a seamless connection between the first floor and the terrace.
